text: Javier Goñi Lopéz (born 12 April 1986 in Madrid) is a swimmer from Spain. He has a disability: He cannot see everything and is an S11/B1 type swimmer. He raced at the 2004 Summer Paralympics in Athens, Greece. He finished second in the 100 meter backstroke race. == References == Category:Spanish swimmers Category:Living people Category:1986 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Madrid Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B1 Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type S11
title: Javier Goñi Lopéz
